Octociz now sees the battle broken out again. This might not end 
until everyone is dead. He sees Zardus trying to attack the 
mercenairies who attacked him, along with Reptillica and Bloodystike. 
With Zardus not completly healthy, Octociz decides he needs to show 
unity between the Maximals and the alliance. He sneaks up behind the 
mercenairies and starts firing.
